event.description: Ian Kinsler strikes out swinging.
Nicholas Castellanos doubles (1) on a line drive to left fielder Melky Cabrera.
Miguel Cabrera strikes out swinging.
Victor Martinez walks. Wild pitch by pitcher James Shields. Nicholas Castellanos to 3rd.
Justin Upton strikes out swinging.
Tyler Collins homers (1) on a fly ball to center field.
James McCann lines out to center fielder Jacob May.
JaCoby Jones walks.
Jose Iglesias flies out to left fielder Melky Cabrera.
Ian Kinsler flies out to right fielder Avisail Garcia.
Nicholas Castellanos strikes out swinging.
Miguel Cabrera flies out to right fielder Avisail Garcia.
Victor Martinez strikes out swinging.
Justin Upton walks.
Tyler Collins flies out to center fielder Jacob May.
James McCann flies out to right fielder Avisail Garcia.
With JaCoby Jones batting, Justin Upton steals (1) 2nd base.
JaCoby Jones lines out to left fielder Melky Cabrera.
Jose Iglesias grounds out, shortstop Tim Anderson to first baseman Jose Abreu.
Ian Kinsler walks.
Nicholas Castellanos flies out to center fielder Jacob May.
Miguel Cabrera flies out to right fielder Avisail Garcia.
Victor Martinez grounds out sharply, second baseman Tyler Saladino to first baseman Jose Abreu.
Justin Upton walks.
Pitching Change: Dan Jennings replaces James Shields.
Tyler Collins grounds into a double play, third baseman Todd Frazier to second baseman Tyler Saladino to first baseman Jose Abreu. Justin Upton out at 2nd.
Pitching Change: Michael Ynoa replaces Dan Jennings.
James McCann walks.
JaCoby Jones grounds into a double play, third baseman Todd Frazier to second baseman Tyler Saladino to first baseman Jose Abreu. James McCann out at 2nd.
Jose Iglesias grounds out softly, third baseman Todd Frazier to first baseman Jose Abreu.
Leury Garcia remains in the game as the left fielder.
Dixon Machado grounds out, pitcher Michael Ynoa to first baseman Jose Abreu.
Nicholas Castellanos reaches on a fielding error by right fielder Avisail Garcia. Nicholas Castellanos to 3rd.
Andrew Romine strikes out swinging.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Alex Avila replaces Victor Martinez.
Alex Avila doubles (1) on a fly ball to center fielder Jacob May. Nicholas Castellanos scores.
Mikie Mahtook strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Tommy Kahnle replaces Michael Ynoa.
Tyler Collins strikes out on a foul tip.
James McCann singles on a line drive to left fielder Leury Garcia.
JaCoby Jones lines out to center fielder Jacob May.
Jose Iglesias strikes out swinging.
Tyler Saladino walks.
Tim Anderson strikes out swinging.
Melky Cabrera lines out to left fielder Justin Upton.
Jose Abreu singles on a ground ball to center fielder JaCoby Jones. Tyler Saladino to 3rd.
Todd Frazier lines out to left fielder Justin Upton.
Tigers challenged (play at 1st), call on the field was overturned: Avisail Garcia grounds out, third baseman Nicholas Castellanos to first baseman Miguel Cabrera.
Matt Davidson triples (1) on a sharp fly ball to center fielder JaCoby Jones.
Geovany Soto walks.
Jacob May hits a sacrifice bunt. Matt Davidson scores. Geovany Soto to 3rd. Jacob May advances to 2nd, on a throwing error by pitcher Matthew Boyd.
Tyler Saladino reaches on a fielder's choice out, shortstop Jose Iglesias to catcher James McCann. Geovany Soto out at home.
Tim Anderson singles on a sharp ground ball to center fielder JaCoby Jones. Jacob May scores. Tyler Saladino to 2nd.
Melky Cabrera walks. Tyler Saladino to 3rd. Tim Anderson to 2nd.
Jose Abreu strikes out swinging.
Todd Frazier pops out to shortstop Jose Iglesias.
Avisail Garcia singles on a ground ball to third baseman Nicholas Castellanos.
With Matt Davidson batting, passed ball by James McCann, Avisail Garcia to 2nd.
Matt Davidson walks.
Geovany Soto homers (1) on a fly ball to left field. Avisail Garcia scores. Matt Davidson scores.
Pitching Change: Anibal Sanchez replaces Matthew Boyd.
Jacob May flies out to center fielder JaCoby Jones.
Tyler Saladino walks.
With Tim Anderson batting, Tyler Saladino caught stealing 2nd base, catcher James McCann to second baseman Ian Kinsler.
Tim Anderson reaches on a fielding error by third baseman Nicholas Castellanos.
Melky Cabrera flies out to center fielder JaCoby Jones.
Jose Abreu flies out to center fielder JaCoby Jones.
Todd Frazier walks. Tim Anderson to 2nd.
Avisail Garcia singles on a line drive to center fielder JaCoby Jones. Tim Anderson scores. Todd Frazier to 3rd.
Matt Davidson homers (1) on a fly ball to center field. Todd Frazier scores. Avisail Garcia scores.
Geovany Soto flies out to right fielder Tyler Collins.
Jacob May called out on strikes.
Tyler Saladino flies out to right fielder Tyler Collins.
Tim Anderson strikes out swinging.
Melky Cabrera doubles (3) on a sharp line drive to center fielder JaCoby Jones.
With Jose Abreu batting, wild pitch by Anibal Sanchez, Melky Cabrera to 3rd.
Jose Abreu singles on a ground ball to center fielder JaCoby Jones. Melky Cabrera scores.
Todd Frazier grounds out softly, third baseman Nicholas Castellanos to first baseman Miguel Cabrera. Jose Abreu to 2nd.
Avisail Garcia strikes out swinging.
Matt Davidson called out on strikes.
Defensive Substitution: Dixon Machado replaces second baseman Ian Kinsler, batting 1st, playing second base.
Defensive Substitution: Andrew Romine replaces first baseman Miguel Cabrera, batting 3rd, playing first base.
Defensive Substitution: Mikie Mahtook replaces left fielder Justin Upton, batting 5th, playing left field.
Pitching Change: Alex Wilson replaces Anibal Sanchez.
Geovany Soto homers (2) on a fly ball to center field.
Jacob May hit by pitch.
Tyler Saladino strikes out on a foul tip.
Tim Anderson pops out to second baseman Dixon Machado.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Leury Garcia replaces Melky Cabrera.
Leury Garcia lines out to center fielder JaCoby Jones.
Alex Avila remains in the game as the designated hitter.
Pitching Change: Blaine Hardy replaces Alex Wilson.
Jose Abreu strikes out swinging.
Todd Frazier flies out to center fielder JaCoby Jones.
Avisail Garcia strikes out swinging.
